highlands.description: Uneven valleys and tall cliffs with many lakes and rivers. Default home of the Mountain Folk.

spring.description: Spring in the Highlands is a time of renewal, usually full of windy days and a good time to start sowing. Late snow may rarely occur.

summer.description: Summer in the Highlands is a warm and wet season, often with days of rain and maybe even storms. Strong winds and a cloudless sky will probably prevail, however.

autumn.description: Autumn in the Highlands marks the end of the farming season, with several rainy or cloudy days and perhaps even an early snowfall.

winter.description: Winter in the Highlands can be harsh and severe, lasting slightly longer than the other seasons and with an almost daily snowfall. Get your warm clothes ready!

snow_early.description:
Snow has come earlier this year...
  • Plant growth speed is slightly reduced.
  • Unsheltered hearthlings are too cold to work as effectively.

snow_late.description:
There's still snow to fall this year...
  • Plant growth speed is somewhat reduced.
  • Unsheltered hearthlings are too cold to work as effectively.
  • Unsheltered pasture animals are hurt by the cold.

snow_early_positive.tooltip: I've waited the whole year for this, the snow season is finally upon us!

snow_early_negative.tooltip: Can't believe we're getting snow this early, darkness and cold approaches!

snow_late_positive.tooltip: I'm glad we can enjoy one more day of snow before the snow season ends!

snow_late_negative.tooltip: Winter should be over already, can't believe we're getting such late snowfall...

none.description: There's no ore in detection range below this point.

some.description: There's some ore below this point, but it might be pretty far down.

lots.description: There's a lot of ore below this point, or it's very close to the surface.

tons.description: You're sitting on a gold mine! (But possibly other ores than gold.)

none.description: Either there's no wilderness here, or it's eclipsed by buildings.

little.description: This area is very tame. Try planting trees to *spruce* it up a bit.

some.description: There's some wilderness here, but it won't attract many animals. A few more or larger plants could help.

lots.description: This area is rather wild, and plenty of animals should be attracted to it.

tons.description: It's a veritable Garden of Eden!

big_game.name: Big Game
big_game.description: Large animals produce large cuts of meat, jerky, pelts, and other useful items

rabid_bear.description: There is something unnatural and wrong with this animal...

large_bear.description: This is a very large bear.

slaughter.description: Harvest this wild animal for some of its resources.
slaughter.disabled_description: This wild animal is unfit for slaughtering.

toggle_training_off.description: This hearthling is currently allowed to train. Click to forbid it!

toggle_training_on.description: This hearthling is currently not allowed to train. Click to allow it!

enable_auto_harvest.description: Enable auto-harvesting of this renewable resource whenever it becomes ready again.

disable_auto_harvest.description: Disable auto-harvesting of this renewable resource.

one_handed_footman.description: This Footman currently prefers using a mainhand weapon and a shield. Click to change!

two_handed_footman.description: This Footman currently prefers using a two-handed weapon. Click to change!

dual_wield_footman.description: This Footman currently prefers using a mainhand weapon with an off-hand weapon. Click to change!

one_handed_knight.description: This Knight currently prefers using a mainhand weapon and a shield. Click to change!

two_handed_knight.description: This Knight currently prefers using a two-handed weapon. Click to change!

bow_archer.description: This Archer currently prefers using a bow. Click to change!

crossbow_archer.description: This Archer currently prefers using a crossbow. Click to change!

manage_parties.description: Manage patrol banners and guard zones (not yet implemented) for this party.

hamstrung.description: Moving slower because of precisely aimed wounds.

out_of_balance.description: Inflicting less damage due to being out of balance.

lightweight_gear.description: This hearthling is wearing lighter and more agile equipment!

fracture.description: Armor reduced due to shattering damage.

open_wounds.description: Bleeding 6 health points every 10 minutes for 40 minutes.

shaken.description: Courage is reduced, more likely to despair and run away.

major_fracture.description: Armor greatly reduced due to shattering damage.

minor_fracture.description: Armor slightly reduced due to shattering damage.

major_hamstrung.description: Moving much slower because of precisely aimed wounds.

minor_hamstrung.description: Moving slightly slower because of precisely aimed wounds.

minor_open_wounds.description: Bleeding 3 health points every 10 minutes for 40 minutes.

major_open_wounds.description: Bleeding 10 health points every 10 minutes for 40 minutes.

minor_out_of_balance.description: Inflicting a bit less damage due to being out of balance.

major_out_of_balance.description: Inflicting a lot less damage due to being out of balance.

major_shaken.description: Courage is greatly reduced, very likely to despair and run away.

minor_shaken.description: Courage is mildly reduced, might despair and run away.

ice_trap.description: Can't move! Stunned by an ice trap!

not_in_water.description: This creature is not really adapted to being on land... It has consequences!

holiday_cheer.description: Woo! This hearthling is enjoying the holidays with slighly increased compassion and speed!

military_expedition.description: These hearthlings might sleep out in the cold and lack some food variety during the first days, true... But it is doubtful that any pesky wolves or goblins will ruin their days later on!
military_expedition.tooltip: A military focused loadout for those that prefer to ensure their safety before everything else.

noble_entourage.description: Not everyone might eat venison, nor there are beds for all... So what? They're not meant for anyone but for some very special and important hearthling - or so they say - that has everyone else following them into the wild.
noble_entourage.tooltip: A small collection of high value items and professions for an oddly specialized beginning.

level_1_data.training_perk_description: A footman can use Training Dummies to train up to Level 3 and will increase the allowed limit of Training Equipment by 2
An archer can use Archery Targets to train up to Level 3 and will increase the allowed limit of Training Equipment by 1
A cleric can use Sheep tamed by a Shepherd to practice their magical gestures and earn experience up to Level 3
A knight can use Training Dummies to train up to Level 3 and will increase the allowed limit of Training Equipment by 1

marblesprout_transmute_recipe.flavor: Only a skilled hand can harvest the weaker seeds, but the flower is lost in the process.

parasol_colony_recipe.flavor: Parasols are slightly toxic when raw and must only be used as a cooking ingredient

herbalist_hood.description: A protective headgear for desert herbalists.

bronze_crossbow_recipe.description: A strong ranged weapon that is slow but efficient in cracking enemy armor.

steel_crossbow_recipe.description: Not fast but a strong, powerful mechanical weapon that can pierce through armor.

legendary_chainmail_recipe.description: Pieces of silver chainmail linked together for the Vanguard's Chainmail.

legendary_mace_recipe.description: An impressive and powerful knight's weapon.
legendary_mace_recipe.flavor: Engineered to shatter any piece of armor

water_gate_recipe.description: Create a small six-way gate that can be toggled open or closed for controlled fluid flow.

water_pump_recipe.description: Make a pump that will take fluids from the placement level to be released on its upper shaft.
water_pump_recipe.flavor: You can stack up pumps to get water higher and higher!

water_gate_greater_recipe.description: Build a larger and more resistant gate for controlling the flow of fluids.

axle_horizontal_recipe.description: Create a rotating shaft that can take mechanical power forward.

axle_vertical_recipe.description: Create a rotating shaft that can take mechanical power vertically.

axle_gear_box_recipe.description: Build a device that allows you to redirect mechanical power to any direction.
axle_gear_box_recipe.flavor: It can be placed in walls during building - like windows or doors.

bone_clay_recipe.description: Required for creating porcelain and beautiful ornate ceramics.

clay_comfy_bed_recipe.description: It has a lot less sand on the mattress.
clay_comfy_bed_recipe.flavor: For a good night of sleep...

clay_bed_crude_recipe.description: A proper place to pass out when exhausted.
clay_bed_crude_recipe.flavor: 'It's like a pot, for sleeping!' - Clarence, Temporary Salesperson

clay_bed_recipe.flavor: Thatch can be obtained by harvesting grass tufts, some plants like Tumbleweed or digging into grassy terrain

clay_training_dummy_recipe.description: Melee fighters can gain experience from practicing with this friendly guy.

clay_training_target_recipe.description: Ranged fighters can gain experience from practicing with this target.

clay_sword_recipe.description: Required to promote a hearthling into a Footman.
clay_sword_recipe.flavor: Might break easily but ideally they won't use it for long... right?

porcelain_fence_bar_double_recipe.description: Craft a double section of porcelain short wall.

porcelain_fence_bar_single_recipe.description: Craft a single section of porcelain short wall.

porcelain_fence_end_recipe.description: Craft a fencepost for a porcelain short wall.

porcelain_fence_gate_recipe.description: Craft a gate for a porcelain short wall.
porcelain_fence_gate_recipe.flavor: This beautiful gate will prevent hearthlings from having to go around

porcelain_wall_lamp_recipe.description: For lighting up a beautiful place.

porcelain_lamp_recipe.flavor: Goes really well on a porcelain table

porcelain_bench_comfy_recipe.description: Makes for a comfortable living room.
porcelain_bench_comfy_recipe.flavor: Don't let the cats touch it!

porcelain_bench_recipe.description: A spacious and exquisite piece of furniture.
porcelain_bench_recipe.flavor: Be careful with the cushions when it rains!

porcelain_chair_comfy_recipe.description: Makes for a comfortable but tidy interior.

porcelain_chair_recipe.description: A simple yet elegant piece of furniture.
porcelain_chair_recipe.flavor: Can also be used as a foot stool

porcelain_comfy_bed_recipe.description: For those that want to look fancy even when asleep.

porcelain_dining_table_recipe.description: Craft a dining table that can be used for eating meals.
porcelain_dining_table_recipe.flavor: The tablecloth allows you to see your porcelain plates

porcelain_display_cabinet_recipe.description: A cabinet to show off all the boring pottery that was made before porcelain!

porcelain_display_cupboard_recipe.description: Displays a nice collection of pottery.
porcelain_display_cupboard_recipe.flavor: Just don't nudge it too hard...

porcelain_dresser_recipe.description: Live in luxury with this beautiful piece of furniture.
porcelain_dresser_recipe.flavor: Who even needs to dress up with such a dresser?

porcelain_end_table_recipe.description: Decoration can be placed on top of it.

porcelain_floor_tile_recipe.description: Create a nice porcelain tiled floor for your hearthlings.

porcelain_jar_of_feathers_recipe.description: Gloriously giant feathers made of porcelain and textiles.

porcelain_shelf_recipe.description: Decorations can be put on top of shelves.

porcelain_table_recipe.description: Even in luxury one might want to eat alone.

porcelain_teapot_recipe.description: A nicely decorated piece of decoration.

porcelain_urn_tall_recipe.description: Very fancy and well painted piece of porcelain.

legendary_silk_recipe.description: Gold and silk woven as one for the Elven King Hood.
legendary_silk_recipe.flavor: No regular weaver can weave with natural magic like elves do

legendary_tome_recipe.description: A legendary tome for the followers of the Church of Plenty.
legendary_tome_recipe.flavor: Through the ways of Cid healing shall be done

mason_workbench_bone_recipe.description: Required by the mason to carve furniture and equipment out of bone material.

legendary_headpiece_recipe.description: A strong and deadly headpiece for the Ascendant Star.
legendary_headpiece_recipe.flavor: Made out of rock extracted straight from a meteorite... or not

stone_market_stall_recipe.description: Merchants can visit this stall to buy and sell goods
stone_market_stall_recipe.flavor: All the lonely merchants... where do they all come from?

stone_safety_standard_recipe.description: Use to designate a safety point.

stone_comfy_bed_recipe.description: Much warmer and softer than the stone itself.

stone_bed_recipe.flavor: Thatch can be obtained by harvesting grass tufts, some plants like Wintermoss or digging into grassy terrain

stone_bed_crude_recipe.description: You might not want to jump into this one.
stone_bed_crude_recipe.flavor: The pretty frame might distract you from the discomfort of sleeping on hard stone

stone_training_dummy_recipe.description: Melee fighters can gain experience from practicing with this friendly guy.

stone_training_target_recipe.description: Ranged fighters can gain experience from practicing with this target.

stone_hatchet_recipe.description: A good starting alternative for those that do not favor the shield. (Off-hand)

giant_bone_axe_recipe.description: Carve a mighty axe from the clavicle of some great beast. (Two-handed)

giant_bone_mace_recipe.description: Create a heavy bone weapon that packs a wallop. (Two-handed)

giant_bone_shield_recipe.description: Craft a knight's shield with the rib cage of a slain beast.

light_giant_bone_shield_recipe.description: Make a shield with the strong and lighter bones of a big creature.

giant_bone_hatchet_recipe.description: Craft a weapon for parrying and attempting counter-attacks. (Off-hand)

giant_bone_pike_recipe.description: Create a spear with the bones of a mighty beast. (Two-handed)

giant_bone_sword_recipe.description: Make a strong weapon with the bones of a slain monster.

giant_bone_short_sword_recipe.description: Craft a knight's sidearm with the bones of a mythical creature.

stone_sword_recipe.flavor: Training with stone swords is a cruel but efficient joke.

mason_workbench_bone.description: Used by the Mason for crafting with bone material.

blacksmith_fuel_oven_recipe.description: Required for refining certain materials like wood and coal.
blacksmith_fuel_oven_recipe.flavor: A strong fire requires the purest fuel. And that starts with hard work. -Lucan Varius, Artifex Ignis

blacksmith_crucible_recipe.description: Can be used for melting and working metals or creating alloys.
blacksmith_crucible_recipe.flavor: Fire and stone shall give you metal, but with metal and metal you shall... Well, get even more metal. -Lucan Varius, Artifex Ignis

blacksmith_forge_recipe.description: Used to heat and smelt ore into usable metal ingots.

blacksmith_forge_advanced_recipe.description: Improved and more efficient than regular furnaces, this furnace is hot enough to smelt precious metals.
blacksmith_forge_advanced_recipe.flavor: All that is gold does not glitter; but if it does, a good furnace will smelt it. -Lucan Varius, Artifex Ignis

blacksmith_workbench_advanced_recipe.description: This incredible anvil can keep the metal hot for the most intricate and powerful crafts.
blacksmith_workbench_advanced_recipe.flavor: Balance between heating and hammering is essential. Or just do both at once. -Lucan Varius, Artifex Ignis

charcoal_recipe.description: Heat wood in the absence of oxygen to acquire charcoal, a good grade fuel.
charcoal_recipe.flavor: Experts call it 'slow pyrolysis'. I call it BIG BONFIRE!

coke_recipe.description: Heat Lumps o' Coal without burning them to efficiently produce coke, a good grade fuel.
coke_recipe.flavor: Cook with coal or coke coal to cook with coke?

bulk_charcoal_recipe.description: Skill allows the Blacksmith to more efficiently burn wood, producing more charcoal.

bulk_coke_recipe.description: Mastery of the craft allows the Blacksmith to achieve maximum efficiency in coking coal.

bulk_copper_ingot_recipe.description: An Enhanced Furnace will allow the Blacksmith to use copper ores more efficiently.

bulk_tin_ingot_recipe.description: An Enhanced Furnace will allow the Blacksmith to use tin ores more efficiently.

bulk_iron_ingot_recipe.description: An Enhanced Furnace will allow the Blacksmith to use iron ores more efficiently.

copper_wall_lantern_recipe.description: A beautiful lantern. Place on buildings to provide light at night.

copper_garden_lantern_recipe.description: A small lantern that's placed on the ground. Suitable for lighting paths or small gardens.

iron_helmet_recipe.description: Even more protection for one's head.

iron_platemail_recipe.description: A full suit of iron designed for a new and promising knight.

steel_helm_recipe.description: Strong and not so heavy protection for one's head.

steel_chainmail_recipe.description: A very fancy and strong chainmail suit of armor for a Footman.

light_iron_shield_recipe.description: Not so heavy but also not so strong.

light_steel_shield_recipe.description: Perfect balance between protection and weight.
light_steel_shield_recipe.flavor: The finest defense for a Footman!

silver_shield_recipe.description: A very strong Knight's shield made with silver.

bronze_axe_recipe.description: A heavier alternative for a starting metal weapon. Can open wounds.

bronze_sword_recipe.description: Basic, but better than a sharpened stick. Can hamstring opponents.

iron_battle_axe_recipe.description: Extra large for when you need some extra punch. Can open wounds.
iron_battle_axe_recipe.flavor: 'Are these all of them?' shouted Rovnar 'They might as well make a line'

iron_sword_recipe.description: A strong and well balanced weapon. Can hamstring opponents.
iron_sword_recipe.flavor: 'I AM YOUR KING!' screamed Regnar Icevulf brandishing his sword.

steel_mace_recipe.description: A powerful and reliable weapon for a Knight.

iron_axe_recipe.description: A short and cheap but efficient weapon.

steel_axe_recipe.description: Very good for hacking and slashing.
steel_axe_recipe.flavor: '...and one hearthling after the other they all drew their axes above the shieldwall.' - The Valin Saga

bronze_hatchet_recipe.description: For parrying attacks and attempting counter-attacks. Puts enemies out of balance.

iron_hatchet_recipe.description: A sturdy small axe used for parrying and attacking. Puts enemies out of balance.

steel_dagger_recipe.description: A small and sharp weapon for both offense and defense. Puts enemies out of balance.
steel_dagger_recipe.flavor: 'There are few things as useful that you can conceal as easily' -O.A.E Guidelines

steel_lance_recipe.description: A long and strong Knight's polearm for harassing multiple enemies. Shakes their hearts!

silver_halberd_recipe.description: An intricate and powerful Knight's weapon. Shakes their hearts!

silver_short_sword_recipe.description: A reliable sidearm for an experienced Knight.
silver_short_sword_recipe.flavor: 'And so his blade shone under the sun for it was made not of steel but of the purest silver' - The Walks of Cid

silver_mace_recipe.description: Blunt. Strong. Unstoppable. Can break armor.

silver_mail_recipe.description: Become the real Knight in shiny armor.

legendary_buckle_recipe.description: A beautifully engraved set of buckles for the Elven King Hood.
legendary_buckle_recipe.flavor: Can also be used for an extremely expensive belt

legendary_mail_recipe.description: Chain armor akin to the ones from the Empire's royal vanguard.

highland_vine.description: This climbable vine grows and spreads across walls and buildings.

bud.description: This vine is starting to grow. Who knows how big it will get?

bud.description: Soon they'll be spreading all around!

thatch_pile.iconic_description: Can be harvested for bundles of thatch when placed.

craftsdwarf_party.description: An industrious folk will never let go of their most prized advancements on embarkment and the Artificer is definitely the top of craftsdwarvenship.
craftsdwarf_party.tooltip: Gets you started early with the most advanced crafts.

kingdom.quote: Nature, balance and mighty shall always be the one and only struggle.
kingdom.long_description: The strong and stalwart folk of the mountains have thrived under a democratic monarchy and isolation for ages. Now they set out to face a new world of powers and technologies that might bring good or woe...
kingdom.post_selection_description: , reclusive dwarves on the brink of change.

grower_description.description: Growers will tend to plants and fungi alike, caring for underground or surface farms, crafting with herbs and looking after the wounded.

grower_trowel_talisman.description: Required to promote a hearthling into a Grower

grower_trowel_equipped.description: Can be used by a Grower for their crafts and to tend plant and fungus alike.

grower_workbench_ghost.description: Used by the Grower for drying, refining and crafting.

grower_terrarium_ghost.description: Used by the Grower to create cultivars, fungal colonies and prepare plants.

grower_workbench_recipe.description: Required for drying, refining and crafting.

grower_terrarium_recipe.description: Can be used to create cultivars and unlock new seeds or spores, fungal colonies and prepare plants.
grower_terrarium_recipe.flavor: Place cultivars anywhere on the world and wait for them to develop into usable forms!

artificer_staff_talisman.description: Required to promote a hearthling into an Artificer

artificer_staff_equipped.description: An advanced device that can channel both the powers of the Hearth and of machines.

sweet_varanus_recipe.description: A highly traditional dwarven meal made with varanus meat and local cherries.

highland_trout_recipe.description: An exquisite meal favorite among the mountain folk.
highland_trout_recipe.flavor: Be sure to cut off the trout's head

brass_plate_recipe.description: Create sheets of cheap but durable metal for furniture and construction.
brass_plate_recipe.flavor: The trick is to melt anything alongside copper

steel_plate_recipe.description: Create sheets of strong and valuable metal for ornate furniture and construction.

artificer_staff_recipe.description: Required to promote a hearthling into an Artificer.
artificer_staff_recipe.flavor: 'And from twisted fires and earthly energies, Brovik whispered life into metal' Artificer Compendium I

brass_sign_blacksmith_recipe.description: A brass plaque with the mark of the Blacksmith to be placed on walls.
brass_sign_blacksmith_recipe.flavor: Specializing in heavy, pointy, dense things!

grower_trowel_recipe.description: Required to promote a hearthling into a Grower.

brass_training_dummy_recipe.description: Melee fighters can gain experience from practicing with this friendly guy.

brass_training_target_recipe.description: Ranged fighters can gain experience from practicing with this target.

mf_camp_standard_ghost.description: A sign of home for all of the mountain folk!

mf_town_banner_balance_ghost.description: For some it is between the old ways and the new that the mountain folk will find glory!

mf_town_banner_balance_token_iconic.description: A shred from the Banner of Balance, carrying along its blessing.

mf_town_banner_might_ghost.description: It is the belief of many of the mountain folk that only through fire and industry there is progress.

mf_town_banner_might_token_iconic.description: A shred from the Banner of Strength, carrying along its blessing.

mf_town_banner_nature_ghost.description: Many of the mountain folk will always follow the old ways.

mf_town_banner_nature_token_iconic.description: A shred from the Banner of Vitality, carrying along its blessing.

sweet_varanus.description: An exotic specialty of the dwarven cuisine.

sweet_varanus_serving.description: A delicious and traditional meat dish.

attach_to_connector.tip_title: Click on a connector to attach this item
attach_to_connector.tip_description: This item must be placed on a mechanical connector, like a gearbox, axle, or powered mill

harvest_and_replant.description: Gather trees, plants, and stones from the surface of the land, replanting when possible.
harvest_and_replant.tip_title: Click and drag to harvest resources
harvest_and_replant.tip_description: Right click to exit this mode

box_move.tip_title: Click and drag to select the items to move, then click new locations for each of them as prompted.
box_move.tip_description: Right click to exit this mode

box_undeploy.description: Undeploy these items and return them to a stockpile.
box_undeploy.tip_title: Click and drag to select the items to undeploy.
box_undeploy.tip_description: Right click to exit this mode

box_enable_auto_harvest.description: Enable auto-harvesting of renewable resources that you own (you'll still need to instruct your hearthlings to harvest them).
box_enable_auto_harvest.tip_title: Click and drag to select renewable resources you own to enable auto-harvesting.
box_enable_auto_harvest.tip_description: Right click to exit this mode

box_disable_auto_harvest.description: Disable auto-harvesting of renewable resources that you own.
box_disable_auto_harvest.tip_title: Click and drag to select renewable resources you own to disable auto-harvesting.
box_disable_auto_harvest.tip_description: Right click to exit this mode

heatmap.name: heatmaps
heatmap.title: Terrain Heatmaps
heatmap.description: Useful view modes that will give you insights on different aspects of the map

ore.description: Detect ore several layers beneath the surface: areas appear brighter where ore is abundant or close to the surface.

wilderness.description: See where the world is wilder (or tamer).

farm.water_affinity_range:
Irrigation
This crop will grow a little faster than normal with [str(i18n_data.min)] - [str(i18n_data.max)] water within the blue outlined region.
farm.water_affinity_min_only:
Irrigation
This crop will grow a little faster with at least [str(i18n_data.min)] water within the blue outlined region.
farm.requires_flooding: This crop must have water covering it to grow. It will not grow without water.
farm.prefers_flooding: This crop grows more quickly when water is covering it. It will grow slower without water.
farm.prefers_no_flooding: This crop grows more slowly when water is covering it. It will grow normally without any irrigation.

underfarm.substrate_description: You need a layer of organic material to plant undercrops.

gameplayTab.auto_craft_recipe_dependencies_descripti: When crafting an item, the crafters will check the inventory to see if there is sufficient of ingredients to use. If not, then they will add more orders to the queue should they need to to fulfill the original order.
gameplayTab.auto_harvest_enabled_description: When a renewable resource you own becomes harvestable, automatically issue a harvest command on that resource.
gameplayTab.auto_harvest_animals_enabled_description: Animals that you own will automatically produce renewable resources (e.g., your poyos will produce eggs).
gameplayTab.auto_harvest_tree_stumps_description: When trees are cut down, harvestable stumps remain. Enabling this option will automatically queue stumps to be harvested.
gameplayTab.terrain_slice_buildings_description: In Terrain Slice mode, don't render entities supported by visible, non-terrain entities.
gameplayTab.water_signal_update_frequency_descriptio: Only update water signals this many ticks of the water system. Increase this value to improve performance with lots of flowing water.
